post.title: Fully SSL compliant now
post.author: zad0xsis
post.content: Well, zad0xsis.net is now fully SSL working. Is SSLv3 compliant, thanks to [my friend Hunter](https://twitter.com/hunterhdolan). You all should give him a follow! :D

post.title: Welcome to my blog :)
post.author: zad0xsis
post.content: Hi! This is my redesigned zad0xsis.net page. Actually took me a while to make it like it is now. I'm also thinking about opensourcing it on my GitHub, but IDK still. The blog uses a modified core of [Bloggy](https://github.com/Studio182/Bloggy). Thanks and enjoy!
